Replies.Reply: Year after year, twenty-something women come to New York City in search of the two "L's": labels and love.
Twenty years ago... I was one of them.
Having gotten the knack for labels early... I concentrated on my search for love.
Turns out, a "knock-off" is not as easy to spot when comes to love...
That is why you need help to spot them...
... Lots of help.
Year after year, my single girlfriends were my salvation. And, as it turns out...
... My meal ticket.
Even though, technically... we're not.
One of us is married...

One of us... relocated.
And... one of us stayed exactly where she was.
